description: Main React component for the game suite frontend, managing user login, game selection, and rendering game components with theme toggling and navigation.

methods.name: RootFlow
methods.description: Handles the main application flow, including login, game selection, and game display with theme toggling.

methods.name: onLogin
methods.description: Handles user login and transitions to game selection view.

methods.name: onSelectGame
methods.description: Handles game selection and switches to game view.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout and returns to login view.
